title: Dance Off, Pants Off with Omar de Frias of Fratello Cigars
itunes:title: Dance Off, Pants Off with Omar de Frias of Fratello Cigars
description: It's been a crazy week at The Cigar Authority and we welcome Omar de Frias of Fratello Cigars into the studio where he will join us live as we recaps the Dance Off between him and his wife vs Mr. Jonathan and his wife...Then we will dig into Dave's latest editorial called Remembering the Cigar Boom where we will look back to the 1990s and the cigar craze that led many of us down this path of enjoyment...Join us for the all the madness on The Cigar Authority...﻿
